title: 1907 Detroit Tigers American League Champions Oversized Postcard with Ty Cobb SGC 1

posts.post_title: 1907 Detroit Tigers American League Champions Oversized Postcard with Ty Cobb SGC 1
posts.post_content:
1907 Detroit Tigers American League Champions Oversized Postcard with Ty Cobb SGC 1

Note that the red line at the right edge of the front is just a scanner glare off the mylar bag inside the slab.

$2500 delivered with a no fee payment.

Thanks for looking
Just one of four ever graded.  Great card!

Thank you, Jeff. 

Bump to top.
